title: when rework shen is out does anyone know if there will be a bundle if all his skins?
body: poppy had a bundle with all her skins so im just wondering

replies.body: They'll probably all be brought out of the vault for a couple of days on rework release. seperate and in bundle. that's what they've done in the past so I don't see why they wouldn't for shen.

Its pretty likely because all his skins (even the legacy ones) are shown on his reveal page, and it would be rude to show the skins but not have them purchasable, and its unlikely they will sell them individually (because they make more money in a bundle) so i think its pretty likely. Sion, Poppy and Karthus all got bundles as well.
